languages.text: "Вообще-то нюансы работы Инквизиции не касаются Вольного Торговца, но учитывая обстоятельства... Да, аколит Лихтенхарт абсолютно права. Я на протяжении нескольких лет имел налаженный контакт с друкари. Они сообщали мне о планируемых рейдах, я их пресекал. Я обеспечивал безопасность Простора, нелюди решали свои внутренние конфликты, на которые мне плевать".

"I would remind you that the particularities of the Inquisition's work lie far beyond a Rogue Trader's purview, but, given the circumstances... Yes, Acolyte Lichtenhart's words are true. It has been several years since I established contact with the Drukhari. They informed me of upcoming raids, and I thwarted them. I kept the Expanse safe while the xenos were absorbed in their internal squabbles, which are of little interest to me."
languages.original_text: "Вообще-то нюансы работы Инквизиции не касаются Вольного Торговца, но учитывая обстоятельства... Да, аколит Лихтенхарт абсолютно права. languages.text: 「異端審問庁の職務の特異性は、自由開拓者の範疇を遥かに超えたものであることを忘れないでもらいたい。だが、状況を踏まえれば…そうだ、アコライト・リヒテンハルトの言葉は真実だ。私がデュカーリとコンタクトを取るようになってから数年が経つ。彼らが私に次の襲撃を知らせるたびに、私は阻止してきた。私にとってはほとんど関心のない内輪もめに異種族どもが終始している間、私はエクスパンスの安全を守ってきたのだ」
languages.original_text: "I would remind you that the particularities of the Inquisition's work lie far beyond a Rogue Trader's purview, but, given the circumstances... Yes, Acolyte Lichtenhart's words are true. It has been several years since I established contact with the Drukhari. They informed me of upcoming raids, and I thwarted them. I kept the Expanse safe while the xenos were absorbed in their internal squabbles, which are of little interest to me."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁の職務の特異性は、自由開拓者の範疇を遥かに超えたものであることを忘れないでもらいたい。だが、状況を踏まえれば…そうだ、アコライト・リヒテンハルトの言葉は真実だ。私がデュカーリとコンタクトを取るようになってから数年が経つ。彼らが私に次の襲撃を知らせるたびに、私は阻止してきた。私にとってはほとんど関心のない内輪もめに異種族どもが終始している間、私はエクスパンスの安全を守ってきたのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “请允许我提醒你，审判庭工作的特殊性远远超出了行商浪人的权限范围。不过考虑到目前的情况……没错，莱肯哈特侍仆说的都是真的。我早在几年前就与黑暗灵族之间达成了合作关系。他们会通知我即将到来的袭击，而我会负责消灭他们。那些异形把所有精力放在内斗之中，而我对他们之间的权力斗争不感兴趣。我仅仅利用了这个机会，守护科罗努斯扩区的安全。”
languages.original_text: "I would remind you that the particularities of the Inquisition's work lie far beyond a Rogue Trader's purview, but, given the circumstances... Yes, Acolyte Lichtenhart's words are true. It has been several years since I established contact with the Drukhari. They informed me of upcoming raids, and I thwarted them. I kept the Expanse safe while the xenos were absorbed in their internal squabbles, which are of little interest to me."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我提醒你，审判庭工作的特殊性远远超出了行商浪人的权限范围。不过考虑到目前的情况……没错，莱肯哈特侍仆说的都是真的。我早在几年前就与黑暗灵族之间达成了合作关系。他们会通知我即将到来的袭击，而我会负责消灭他们。那些异形把所有精力放在内斗之中，而我对他们之间的权力斗争不感兴趣。我仅仅利用了这个机会，守护科罗努斯扩区的安全。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Je vous rappelle que les spécificités des activités de l'Inquisition dépassent de loin les compétences d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, mais au vu des circonstances... Oui, ce qu'a dit l'acolyte Lichtenhart est vrai. Cela fait plusieurs années que je suis entré en contact avec les Drukharis. Ils m'ont informé des raids à venir et je les ai déjoués. J'ai assuré la sécurité des Étendues pendant que les xénos étaient absorbés par leurs guerres intestines, qui ne m'intéressent guère. »
languages.original_text: "I would remind you that the particularities of the Inquisition's work lie far beyond a Rogue Trader's purview, but, given the circumstances... Yes, Acolyte Lichtenhart's words are true. It has been several years since I established contact with the Drukhari. They informed me of upcoming raids, and I thwarted them. I kept the Expanse safe while the xenos were absorbed in their internal squabbles, which are of little interest to me."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous rappelle que les spécificités des activités de l'Inquisition dépassent de loin les compétences d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, mais au vu des circonstances... Oui, ce qu'a dit l'acolyte Lichtenhart est vrai. Cela fait plusieurs années que je suis entré en contact avec les Drukharis. Ils m'ont informé des raids à venir et je les ai déjoués. J'ai assuré la sécurité des Étendues pendant que les xénos étaient absorbés par leurs guerres intestines, qui ne m'intéressent guère. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Quisiera recordarle que los particulares del trabajo de la Inquisición no entran en la jurisdicción de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, pero dadas las circunstancias... Sí, la acólita Lichtenhart decía la verdad. Han pasado varios años desde que establecí contactos con los Drukhari. Ellos me informaron de incursiones planeadas y yo las frustré. Mientras los xenos se concentraban en luchas internas que no me importan, protegí la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "I would remind you that the particularities of the Inquisition's work lie far beyond a Rogue Trader's purview, but, given the circumstances... Yes, Acolyte Lichtenhart's words are true. It has been several years since I established contact with the Drukhari. They informed me of upcoming raids, and I thwarted them. I kept the Expanse safe while the xenos were absorbed in their internal squabbles, which are of little interest to me."

traits.locale_text: «Quisiera recordarle que los particulares del trabajo de la Inquisición no entran en la jurisdicción de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, pero dadas las circunstancias... Sí, la acólita Lichtenhart decía la verdad. Han pasado varios años desde que establecí contactos con los Drukhari. Ellos me informaron de incursiones planeadas y yo las frustré. Mientras los xenos se concentraban en luchas internas que no me importan, protegí la Extensión».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ich möchte Euch daran erinnern, dass die Details der Arbeit der Inquisition weit außerhalb der Zuständigkeit {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} liegen, aber angesichts der Umstände ... Ja, Akolythin Lichtenhart sagt die Wahrheit. Ich habe bereits vor einigen Jahren Kontakt zu den Drukhari hergestellt. Sie informierten mich über bevorstehende Angriffe und ich schlug sie zurück. Ich hielt die Ausdehnung sicher, während die Xenos mit internen Querelen beschäftigt waren, die für mich nicht von Interesse waren."
languages.original_text: "I would remind you that the particularities of the Inquisition's work lie far beyond a Rogue Trader's purview, but, given the circumstances... Yes, Acolyte Lichtenhart's words are true. It has been several years since I established contact with the Drukhari. They informed me of upcoming raids, and I thwarted them. I kept the Expanse safe while the xenos were absorbed in their internal squabbles, which are of little interest to me."

Ich hielt die Ausdehnung sicher, während die Xenos mit internen Querelen beschäftigt waren, die für mich nicht von Interesse waren."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Engizisyon'un işlerine dair ayrıntılar, bir Hür Tacir'in yetkilerini çok aşar ama şu durumda... Evet, Havari Lichtenhart doğru söylemiş. Drukharilerle iletişim kurmamdan bu yana birkaç yıl geçti. Olacak baskınların haberini onlardan alıyor ve bunları püskürtüyordum. Ben Enginlik'i güvende tutarken o zenolar da birbirini yiyordu. Tabii kendi meseleleri beni hiç ilgilendirmez."
languages.original_text: "I would remind you that the particularities of the Inquisition's work lie far beyond a Rogue Trader's purview, but, given the circumstances... Yes, Acolyte Lichtenhart's words are true. It has been several years since I established contact with the Drukhari. They informed me of upcoming raids, and I thwarted them. I kept the Expanse safe while the xenos were absorbed in their internal squabbles, which are of little interest to me."
